column4: I keep getting this weird stuff happening with openoffice.org.....everytime I try to open this particular doc (it's an excel file), oo.org acts like it's trying to open it with Writer/Web......but I want it to open with Calc.....this is frustrating me to no end and I'd really like to completely remove oo.org and all the config files and EVERYTHING and reinstall it fresh so that maybe that will resolve the issue.....any suggestio
if that will work, I'll jump for joy....but I'm a pessimist when it comes to these things....I'll try it though.
